data.title: The Australian Defence Force Academy (ADFA)
data.meta_description: The Australian Defence Force Academy (ADFA) provides a unique opportunity for future defence force leaders to undertake military training whilst obtaining a university degree at UNSW Canberra.
data.text:
Combining teaching and research with military education

Learn from some of Australia’s brightest minds in education and research when you study at UNSW Canberra at ADFA. We're Australia's only academic institution with an integrated Defence focus.

We're committed to:

enhancing the intellectual edge of the Australian Defence Force

supporting the ADF Joint Professional Military Education program

developing future global leaders.

UNSW Canberra specialises in high-quality undergraduate and postgraduate courses in all areas relating to military, strategic and defence studies. This means future leaders of the Navy, Army and Air Force can combine their military and leadership training with our world-class university programs and defence industry expertise.

Through our teaching and research, we offer deep links to industry and government where careers are made.

Study at ADFA

Our unique partnership with the Australian Defence Force Academy (ADFA) dates back more than half a century. Future leaders of the Navy, Army and Air Force undertake military and leadership training while studying at one of the world’s top universities.

Find out more about your study options at ADFA.
